plot: A surreal mystery fable based on an ancient Japanese story about a traditional Japanese tattoo artist, who discovers that he is both dead and alive at the same time.
title: Mu
plot_es: A surreal mystery fable based on an ancient Japanese story about a traditional Japanese tattoo artist, who discovers that he is both dead and alive at the same time.
plot_en: A surreal mystery fable based on an ancient Japanese story about a traditional Japanese tattoo artist, who discovers that he is both dead and alive at the same time.
